reviewText:
Judy and I love the Primitive Quartet, Our brothers in Christ. Their songs relate directly with the Bible. We play our DVD and CD every day. We don't know what we would do if we didn't have your music. We consider you as family.  We receive a blessing every time we play your DVD. God Bless you in your ministry. No words can explain how we feel about you. As Norman would say, SHARE HEAVEN WITH YOU.

  Benjamin and Judy
